name: Conner Hufnagel
title: Software Engineer
summary: I am a passionate Software Engineer based in Los Angeles, CA. I have experience working in cross functional teams building backend and frontend applications. I am proficient in Python, C#, React.js, and Typescript.

languages: Typescript, Javascript, Python, C#, SQL, C++, HTML5, CSS, Swift, Java
Technologies: React.js, Flask, FastAPI, Django, ASP.NET, .NET Core, Azure, AWS, GraphQL, REST, Docker, JSON, Git, Jest, Express.js
Databases: MySQL, Postgres, MongoDB, Firebase, SQLite, Supabase, DynamoDB

responsibilities: Implemented GraphQL API with FastAPI in Python, optimizing communication between the frontend and backend, and ensuring efficient data handling
Built modular and reusable UI components in TypeScript, enhancing the scalability and maintainability of the codebase
Ensured code quality and best practices by writing unit tests and utilizing type safety features in TypeScript, resulting in fewer runtime errors and easier debugging
Diagnosed and resolved complex technical issues with high-specialized defense computer hardware and software systems supporting 500 personnel across multiple locations
Managed data input and output processes, implementing rigorous data verification and backup procedures to ensure 100% data accuracy and integrity during over 200 individual operations

Conducted rigorous pre-project system checks and detailed post-project debriefs, ensuring accurate data collection, analysis, reporting, and informed decision-making for project planning and evaluation

Maintained and managed a comprehensive database, meticulously tracking health data and compliance records for every student enrolled, ensuring accurate documentation and timely updates for over 5 years post-care in adherence to DHS regulations

Implemented new health compliance policies across 17 school sites to align with federal health standards, resulting in achieving a 92% compliance rate for a student population exceeding 1500 individuals. A 27% increase from initial compliance ratings

Led a team of 4 through a comprehensive federal compliance audit, overseeing health screenings for 500 actively enrolled children within a stringent 90-day timeframe to ensure continued funding and program viability

projects.name: Autaly
projects.description: A platform for simplifying logistics billing and invoicing processes for small to medium-sized 3PL businesses.
responsibilities: Implemented a backend API and database to store information on clientâ€™s invoices, orders, and payment information.
Created a responsive front end UI for filtering invoices and automating invoicing based on user defined charge rules, which led to an increase in client subscription to the service
Optimized API call and state management to ensure a quality user experience and minimize loading times

projects.name: Noodle
projects.description: A platform for finding local live music events and venues in your area. Implemented using the Ticketmaster API and the Spotify API to provide users with a seamless experience.
technologies: Python, Flask, Javascript, React.js, TicketmasterAPI, Leaflet.js, SpotifyAPI
responsibilities: Implemented a Python back-end rest API and Reactjs front-end UI using Leafletjs to create a live-music ticketing application following UI/UX best practices
Developed backend Rest APIs for a user to find concerts in their city and purchase tickets through Ticketmaster
Tested component performance using Jest J unit testing and QA practices to achieve 86% test cases over the program

projects.name: ConnerAPI
projects.description: This is a Rest API for serving the details of my resume in JSON format.
responsibilities: Utilized Clean architecture design patterns to create a maintainable, scalable, and modular backend web server system with multiple endpoints and HTTP methods supported
Implemented connection with a mySQL database for increased data security and for maintaining an external repository of data
Deployed the product using Microsoft Azure and GitHub actions to provide CI/CD to keep up with additions and updates to the web server

degree.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
